duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide Level 1 and 2 support for applications, usage questions, and technical problems via phone or at user workstations.
Configure cost-effective and standard desktop hardware and software orders.
Under supervision, install, configure, test, and troubleshoot personal computer systems, following established standards.
Coordinate the work of vendors, service providers, and contractors as required.
Grant security access to corporate networks and applications.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Arts or equivalent or three to five years of relevant job experience.
Good understanding of SaaS and on-prem applications.
Good understanding of how an organization’s technology landscape works.
Good understanding of the Microsoft Operating systems, preferably Windows 10 and 11.
Excellent customer service and communication skills.
